item.title: Cryptspawn Potion
item.fluff: Drinking this viscous fluid that smells of decay provides protection against powers of creatures that live beyond the grave by making you similar to one

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You spend a healing surge to become dessicated until the end of the encounter.
While dessicated, you have reist 5 necrotic, 5 poison.
Resist 10 necrotic, 10 poison.
Resist 15 necrotic, 15 poison.
Also, if you make Endurance checks against a disease of the potion's level or lower during your next extended rest, you gain a +5 power bonus to the first check.

item.title: Elixir of Dragon Breath
item.fluff: Whether frigid, acidic, or crackling with energy, this liquid grants you a poten blast of dragon breath

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You spend a healing surge to be able to use the following attack action at-will until the end of the encounter:
Standard Action: Attack: Close blast 3 (each creature in the blast); Item's level +3 vs. Reflex
Hit: 2d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Level 17: 3d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Level 27: 4d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
When this elixir is created, the creator chooses acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The attack deals the chosen type of damage, and the power and attack have the corresponding keyword.

Special: If you have the dragon breath racial power, you can choose to make the attack granted by this elixir deal damage of the same type as your dragon breath and have the coresponding keyword. You make this decision when you drink the elixir.

item.title: Potion of Cure Wounds
item.fluff: This potion covers your wounds and bruises in a silver light, causing them to mend

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You drink the potion.
If you have at least one healing surge: you must spend one to regain 1d8+5 hit points.
Level 11: 2d8+10 hit points.
Level 21: 3d8+20 hit points.
If you are bloodied and don't have any healing surges: you regain the same amount of hit points.
If neither of the above things is true: there is no effect.

item.title: Potion of Eladrin Shape
item.fluff: A crystal vial contains a milky green liquid that smells simultaneously of hot iron and pine forest - the sharp tang of its flavor leads to the power to take on another form

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Your appearance is altered through an illusion, causing you to appear as an eladrin of your gender for 1 hour. You can dismiss the illusion as a free action on your turn.
Level 7: 24 hours.
Level 12: A week.
Level 17: A month.
Level 22: A year and a day.

Your eladrin guise is not of any particular eladrin, and it shares some of your general features. Thus, if your nose is particularly long or wide for a member of your race, your guise has an eladrin nose of greater size as well.
If you have a particularly distinctive feature, such as a facial scar or discolored eye, this too is revealed in your eladrin guise.
You retain your attire, mannerisms, voice, and speech patterns.
You gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff checks to pass yourself as the creature you appear as, although the bonus is reduced to +2 if you must speak.

item.title: Potion of Feyspeak
item.fluff: This golden liquid looks like honey, but the gift it gives is far sweeter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: For the next 5 minutes, you can speak with and be understood by any fey beast. This does not guarantee that it will be friendly, and some fey beasts might not have much to talk about.
Level 13: For the next hour.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: For the next hour, you can speak with and be understood by any fey beasts and you speak, read and write Sylvan. You also gain a +2 power bonus to Bluff checks, Diplomacy checks, and Intimidate checks against fey beasts.
Level 13: For the next 8 hours, and a +4 power bonus.
